snippet.title: Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered Edition - Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered Edition for Nintendo Switch is OUT NOW!

Get it here: http://n.thq.com/6SAT30p39Kj

Nintendo Switch Features:
- Choice between Performance and Quality Mode
- Fully reworked graphics – heavily reworked textures and graphic features adding, for example, specular maps
- Improved shadow rendering
- Improved lighting
- Reworked shaders and postprocessing
- Optional Motion Controls for a better sense of aiming while playing in handheld mode

You prefer other platforms? Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered Edition is also available on PC, and the other consoles out there!

Steam: http://n.thq.com/j5jR30kMFqr
gog.com: http://n.thq.com/T7YO30kMFYP
PSN: http://n.thq.com/4Lkg30kMPtr
Xbox Live: http://n.thq.com/9h8d30kMPx5

---
Follow www.youtube.com/c/thqnordic and don't miss our latest trailers and updates!
